所有类和接口

类
说明
BackGroundPanel
BackGroundPanel is a class that extends JPanel and is used to set the background of the game
Bag
This class is the bag of the game
BagTest
 
Board
This class is the board of the game
BoardTest
 
BoardUtil
This class is used to create the board
ButtonColorUI
ButtonColorUI is a class that extends BasicButtonUI and is used to change the color of the button when it is pressed
ButtonUtil
ButtonUtil is a class that is used to create buttons
Card
This class is the abstract class of the cards
CardPointer
This class is used to check if a card is selected
CardUtil
This class is used to create the cards
ChairManLabel
 
ChatDialog
Chat dialog
ChatListener
 
ChatManager
This class is used to manage the chat messages Every match has a chat manager
ChatRunnable
ChatRunnable is a class that implements Runnable and is used to create a new chat window
ChatTest
 
Cli
This class is the Cli
ClientApp
This class is used to start the client
ClientCallBack
To call the method in the client from the server, go to the PlayController.clientInput.callback
ClientCommunicationController
 
ClientHandlerSocket
This class is the client handler socket
ClientInputHandler
This class is the client input handler
ClientView
This class is used to store the client view of the match
Color
Color class for TUI
CommonGoal
This class is the abstract class of the Common Goals
CommonGoal2Columns
Check if there are two columns with 6 different types of tiles
CommonGoal2Lines
Two lines each formed by 6 different types of tiles.
CommonGoal3Column
Three columns each formed by 6 tiles of maximum three different types.
CommonGoal4Lines
Four lines each formed by 5 tiles of maximum three different types.
CommonGoal8Tiles
Eight tiles of the same type.
CommonGoalCorner
Four tiles of the same type in the four corners of the bookshelf.
CommonGoalDiagonal
Five tiles of the same type forming a diagonal.
CommonGoalGroup
This class includes the common goal of 4 groups and common goal of 6 groups User can define the number of groups and the number of tiles in each group by using the constructor
CommonGoalPanel
CommonGoalPanel is a class that extends JPanel and is used to show the common goals
CommonGoalSquare
Two groups each containing 4 tiles of the same type in a 2x2 square.
CommonGoalStairs
Five columns of increasing or decreasing height.
CommonGoalTest
 
CommonGoalUtil
This class is used to create the common goals
CommonGoalXShape
Five tiles of the same type forming an X.
CommunicationController
 
CommunicationInterface
Communication interface
CommunicationListener
 
ConnectionType
 
Coordinates
The class is used to store particular Coordinates and also to delimit extremities
EnemyPanel
EnemyPanel is a class that extends JPanel and is used to show the enemy
FontUtil
FontUtil is a class that is used to load fonts
GameBoardPanel
GameBoardPanel is a class that extends JPanel and is used to show the game board
GameController
 
GameManager
This class is the game manager
GamePhase
The values of this enumeration represent the phases of a player's turn during the game.
GameResultsInterface
Game results interface
GameState
Each value represent the state of the match GameState.WaitingPlayers: the match hasn't started yet, and it's still waiting for players to join to reach full capacity.
GameTest
 
Grid
This class is the abstract class of the grid
Gui
Gui is a class that is used to show the game to the player and to ask him what he wants to do
Hand
Hand class contains an array with 3 elements.
IClientCallBack
This interface is the client call back
IClientInput
Interface for RMI communication, any class that will be used by the client must implement this interface
ICommunication
 
IconUtil
IconUtil is a class that is used to load the icons and resize them
ImageUtil
 
InputReadTask
This class is used to read input from the user
ItemCard
This class is the abstract class of the cards

ScoringTokenLabel is a class that extends JPanel and is used to display the scoring token card

Server class

This class is used to manage the chat messages Every match has a chat manager

Login interface

ServerMessage
 
ServerVirtualView
This class is used to manage the virtual view of the server It contains the virtual match list and the virtual online players
ServerVirtualViewTest

This class is used to manage the shelves of the player

ShelfPanel is a class that extends JPanel and is used to display the shelf

SocketServer
This class is the socket server
Storage
You can find the virtual view data in this class
UserStatus
Connection status of the player in the game UserStatus.Offline: Not in the game but has an account, maybe due to connection loss or else
UserStatus.Online: Account logged and in the game menu, but not in a match
UserStatus.GameMember: Online and playing in a match
View
View is an interface that is used to show the game to the player and to ask him what he wants to do
VirtualView
This class will be serialized and sent to the client
VirtualViewHelper
We use this class to build the virtual view
VirtualViewTest

Waiting room interface
WaitingRoomListener

This class is the welcome class
